subject: Indian History
topic: Mahajanapad Kal aur Magadh ka Uday
question_en: Which of the following Mahajanapad was known for its strong and efficient administration?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन सा महाजनपद अपने मजबूत और कारगर प्रशासन के लिए जाना जाता था?
explanation_en: Magadha was known for its strong and efficient administration.
explanation_hi: मगध अपने मजबूत और कारगर प्रशासन के लिए जाना जाता था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Mahajanapad Kal aur Magadh ka Uday
question_en: Who was the founder of Nanda dynasty?
question_hi: नंद वंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Mahapadma Nanda was the founder of Nanda dynasty.
explanation_hi: महापद्म नंद नंद वंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: Mahajanapad Kal aur Magadh ka Uday
question_en: Which of the following was the capital of Magadha?
question_hi: मगध की राजधानी कौन सी थी?
explanation_en: Rajagriha was the capital of Magadha.

subject: Indian History
topic: Mahajanapad Kal aur Magadh ka Uday
question_en: Who was the great Mauryan emperor?
explanation_en: Chandragupta Maurya was the great Mauryan emperor.
explanation_hi: चंद्रगुप्त मौर्य बृहद मौर्य सम्राट थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: Mahajanapad Kal aur Magadh ka Uday
question_en: Which of the following was the main occupation of the people of Magadha?
question_hi: मगध के लोगों की मुख्य आय का स्रोत क्या था?
explanation_en: Agriculture was the main occupation of the people of Magadha.
explanation_hi: कृषि मगध के लोगों की मुख्य आय का स्रोत थी।

subject: Indian History
topic: Mahajanapad Kal aur Magadh ka Uday
question_en: Who built the famous Mauryan palace at Pataliputra?
question_hi: पाटलिपुत्र में प्रसिद्ध मौर्य वास्तुकला का महल किसने बनवाया था?
explanation_en: Chandragupta Maurya built the famous Mauryan palace at Pataliputra.
explanation_hi: चंद्रगुप्त मौर्य ने पाटलिपुत्र में प्रसिद्ध मौर्य वास्तुकला का महल बनवाया था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Mahajanapad Kal aur Magadh ka Uday
question_en: What was the name of the famous Mauryan emperor who spread Buddhism?
question_hi: बौद्ध धर्म को फैलाने वाले प्रसिद्ध मौर्य सम्राट का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: Ashoka was the famous Mauryan emperor who spread Buddhism.
explanation_hi: अशोक बौद्ध धर्म को फैलाने वाले प्रसिद्ध मौर्य सम्राट थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: Mahajanapad Kal aur Magadh ka Uday
question_en: Which of the following was the main river of Magadha?
question_hi: मगध का मुख्य नदी कौन सी थी?
explanation_en: Ganga was the main river of Magadha.
explanation_hi: गंगा मगध की मुख्य नदी थी।
